```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(leaflet)
library(tidygeocoder)
```

Filtering NYC restaurant data to include only critical flags with grades of B and C.
```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

nycrest =
  rest_inspec %>%
  filter(critical_flag %in% c("Critical")) %>%
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN") %>%
  drop_na(score) %>%
  drop_na(grade) %>%
  filter(grade %in% c("C")) 
```
